channel.title: 2. Amazon SageMaker and HuggingFace library on Getting Started with Amazon SageMaker Studio
channel.description: Recent content in 2. Amazon SageMaker and HuggingFace library on Getting Started with Amazon SageMaker Studio

item.title: 3.1 Prepare your dataset and upload it to Amazon S3
item.description: Watch the livestream to follow along with the presenter Open the following notebook to follow along Notebook: 1_prepare_dataset.ipynb A copy of the code from the notebook is also available below, if you prefer building your notebook from scratch by copy pasting each code cell and then running them. Preparing your dataset import sagemaker import boto3 import pandas as pd import numpy as npsess = boto3.Session() sagemaker_session = sagemaker.

item.title: 3.2 Train and fine-tune NLP models with SageMaker and HuggingFace library
item.description: Watch the livestream to follow along with the presenter Open the following notebook to follow along Notebook: 2_finetune_deploy_huggingface A copy of the code from the notebook is also available below, if you prefer building your notebook from scratch by copy pasting each code cell and then running them. Finetuning HuggingFace models with Amazon SageMaker # Install or upgrade sagemaker sdk and sagemaker debugger sdk # Ignore warnings related to pip !
